Tucson jumps to his feet quickly. The buzzing was familliar.  He does what =
any Autobot would do to try and defend himself.. Reach for a weapon he was =
well adept at using.  But it was not there.  He had forgotten that Straight=
 Shot is his weapon when she transforms into his cross bow.  He quickly rem=
embers, and looks down at Vestige.

" Rest in peace old friend.  It's all r=
ight, eventually I'll get my bearings."

He bravely prepares to defend hims=
elf via un armed combat skills.

" And something tells me I'll be learning =
very fast."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@=
...> wrote:
>
> Vestige sat back as Tuscon talked, clearly not expecting to=
 get so
> much information in one shot. The Autobot was clearly older and w=
eak.
> However he did what he could to follow everything that Tuscon said. =
It
> seemed though that Vestige was getting weaker.
> 
> Vestige smiled sad=
ly as Tuscon asked him about the place, "I don't
> know what I can tell you=
. I can only say that I have been here as long
> as I can remember. There w=
as once more activity, more people, but now
> there is just me . . . me and=
 . . . " Vestige slumped over on his side
> as his optics went dim.
> 
> Me=
anwhile outside the sound of buzzing could be heard. It was small at
> firs=
t, very faint, perhaps it had been building for quite some time
> but now i=
t was clearly audible and it was getting louder and louder.

> On Sat, Jul 17, 2010 at 12:06 AM, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wro=
te:
> >
> >
> >
> > Tucson takes a seat next to Vestige, knowing that to ex=
plain everything would mean taking the time to do so in a personable manner=
.
> >
> > " It all started not too long ago. I had been working with Lord P=
erseus, a commander of the Maximals of Atlantis, we left, and happened upon=
 a planet, where we came in contact with an old Maximal base. From that bas=
e, I learned of what had happened to my commander, and comrade, Rodimus Pri=
me. He had been abducted by Hydras, and turned against his faction forceful=
ly. I heard of what happened and I knew I had to begin my own quest to try =
and recover Rodimus, no matter if I was destroyed in the process while doin=
g so. I traveled to the Black Fortress, where I had learned the whereabouts=
 of Dark Rodimus, who was Rodimus but reprogrammed into a darker figure and=
 turned into a slave of Lord Hydras. It was a long battle, and at first, I =
did not succeed. I was rescued myself by a tiny Maximal, named Rat Trap, wh=
o I could see desperately needed a friend, and in saving me, he found one a=
nd so did I. He called for backup and I was recovered by Lord Elder, a lead=
er of a Maximal group. He had faithfully guarded the Autobot Ark until such=
 time that an Autobot would return to restore what was lost. It was there w=
here I was lead to the body of Optimus Prime, and it was there where the Ma=
trix of Leadership granted me it's power and I was given the power of the P=
rimes. Now, before this, I was known as just Tucson, an average Autobot, wh=
o fought faithfully in the wars, but suffered a great defeat which left me =
visually impaired even today. But for some reason, right now, it seems to h=
ave corrected itself. "
> >
> > He shifts his weight and then begins to tel=
l the rest of the tale.
> >
> > " That leads me to your question Vestige. W=
hen I was at the Black fortress, I released a bolt of energy from my spark,=
 which supposedly was supposed to heal Rodimus of any possession that Hydra=
s may have had over him. Not at first though. He had recovered a small frac=
tion of his old self but was quickly overcome by the evil once more. But it=
 was not until he had sensed something within him that he made the change b=
ack to his normal self. So, we all began to proceed out of the Black fortre=
ss, only to be entrapped by another enemy. An enemy which was insectile, an=
d arachnid in nature. Rodimus told me to run, and at first I did, but in my=
 spark I knew I could not abandon him. So, I went back and proceeded to sea=
rch for Rodimus along with my comrades. Once we found him, he was bound by =
countless numbers of dangerous tendrills, and the only way for me to save h=
im, was to lend my spark in efforts to save his. And that is how I got here=
. I will do what ever it takes to recover Rodimus. I lost him three times, =
I will not lose him again. I could have fought the arachnids, but I saw som=
ething disturbing in them. Their colors, they were the same as Rodimus Prim=
e's.. The bright reds, oranges and yellows of his armor and vehicular form.=
 There is more to defeating the evil than meets the eye and perhaps you may=
 be able to tell me about this place, and from there I can compile a strate=
gy to get Rodimus back. I don't want to make any foolish moves if I don't h=
ave to."
> >

nus@> wrote:

n submission, to show that he meant no harm. Obviously the mech had seen so=
me hard times and was alarmed by his pressense.
> > > >

s Tucson Prime, I'm an Autobot commander, well just became a commander. I'm=
 very good friends of Optimus Prime, and comrade to Rodimus Prime. Here, se=
e? I have the Autobot insignia. I won't hurt you, I promise. I'm actually w=
illing to help you, if you'll let me."
> > > >
> > > > His voice definitely=
 matching that of Optimus Prime, yet just a slight different than the legen=
dary commander of the Autobots. His body language matches that of Optimus, =
as does his gentile demeanor.
> > >
> > > What Tuscon sees as he approaches=
 is what appears to Alpha Trion in
> > > size and body shape, however as he=
 approaches he can see that the
> > > colors are red and yellow with little=
 to none of the blues that
> > > decorated that venerated transformer.
> > =
>
> > > His voice is a little different as well as he watched Tuscon with
>=
 > > careful optics and then spoke, "You are a Prime?" the figure said as
>=
 > > he lowered his weapon. As the figure's arm drops Tuscon can see the
> =
> > Autobot sigil on the figure as well. "I am Vestige." he said, his
> > >=
 voice raspy and rough. "How did you get here?"
